name: Another Infinite Procedural Terrain Surfer
description:
Infinite Procedural Terrain Surfer, aka No Sheeps Sky 2

Is.. an endless terrain surfer runner.
You can walk endlessly, fly endlessy and surf your way over endless lakes and hills.
If you want to make it more challenging, hit the big sword once or a hundred times :)

The few sounds belong to their respective creators ;)

You can find NoSheepsSky 1 on my site at https://olivierlapointesite.wordpress.com/main/games/
